```{r SetupVars2}

MyEffector <- c(exp_detail_data$Inhibitor1, exp_detail_data$Inhibitor1Metabolite, 
                exp_detail_data$Inhibitor2)
MyEffector <- str_comma(MyEffector[complete.cases(MyEffector)])

if(class(prettify_compound_names) == "logical" &&
   # NB: prettify_compound_names is the argument; prettify_compound_name is the function.
   prettify_compound_names){
    
    MySubstrate <- prettify_compound_name(exp_detail_data$Substrate)
    MyEffector <- prettify_compound_name(MyEffector)
    
} else if(class(prettify_compound_names) == "character"){
    
    MySubstrate <- as.character(prettify_compound_names["substrate"])
    MyEffector <- as.character(prettify_compound_names["effector"])
    
} else {
    
    MySubstrate <- exp_detail_data$Substrate
    
}

prettify_compound_names <- c("substrate" = as.character(MySubstrate), 
                             "effector" = as.character(MyEffector))

SDMD_sub_txt <- ifelse(exp_detail_data$Regimen_sub == "Multiple Dose", 
                       switch(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub, 
                              "Oral" = "multiple oral doses", 
                              "IV" = "multiple IV doses"),
                       switch(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub, 
                              "Oral" = "a single oral dose",
                              "IV" = "a single IV dose"))

DoseFreq_sub <- ifelse(exp_detail_data$Regimen_sub == "Multiple Dose", 
                       ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_sub == 12, 
                              "BID", 
                              ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_sub == 24, "QD", "OTHER REGIMEN")),
                       "")

SDMD_inhib_txt <- ifelse(complete.cases(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_inhib), 
                         switch(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_inhib, 
                                "Oral" = "multiple oral doses", 
                                "IV" = "multiple IV doses"),
                         switch(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_inhib, 
                                "Oral" = "a single oral dose",
                                "IV" = "a single IV dose"))
DoseFreq_inhib <- ifelse(complete.cases(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_inhib), 
                         ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_inhib == 12, 
                                "BID", 
                                ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseInt_inhib == 24, "QD", "OTHER REGIMEN")),
                         "")

numbers <- c("one", "two", "three", "four", "five", "six", "seven", "eight",
             "nine", "ten", "eleven", "twelve", "thirteen", "fourteen", 
             "fifteen", "sixteen", "seventeen", "eighteen", "nineteen", "twenty")

Numbers <- str_to_title(numbers)

if(exp_detail_data$Regimen_sub == "Multiple Dose"){
    DoseDay <- "last"
} else {
    
    DoseDay <- str_split_fixed(exp_detail_data$StartDayTime_sub, "Day |, ", 3)[2]
    LastDig <- as.numeric(str_sub(DoseDay, start = -1, end = -1))
    DoseDay <- paste0(DoseDay, ifelse(LastDig %in% c(0, 4:9), 
                                      "th", 
                                      ifelse(LastDig == 1, "st", 
                                             ifelse(LastDig == 2, "nd", "rd"))))
}

DefaultCompound_txt <- ifelse(default_cmpd_file, 
                              paste("The default compound library file for",
                                    ifelse(victim_sim, MyEffector, MySubstrate),
                                    "was used."), "")

```

# METHODS

#### Simulation of `r sub("^A", "a", str_to_title(SDMD_sub_txt))` of `r exp_detail_data$Dose_sub` mg `r paste(str_to_title(MySubstrate), ifelse(exp_detail_data$Regimen_sub == "Multiple Dose", DoseFreq_sub, ""))` Administered with `r str_to_title(MyEffector)` in `r tidyPop(exp_detail_data$Population)$PopulationCap` 

`r ifelse(exp_detail_data$NumTrials %in% 1:20, Numbers[exp_detail_data$NumTrials], exp_detail_data$NumTrials)` virtual trials of `r exp_detail_data$NumSubjTrial` `r tidyPop(exp_detail_data$Population)$Population` (`r exp_detail_data$PercFemale*100`% female) aged `r exp_detail_data$Age_min` to `r exp_detail_data$Age_max` years receiving `r SDMD_sub_txt` of `r exp_detail_data$Dose_sub` mg `r MySubstrate` in the absence of `r MyEffector` and `r ifelse(exp_detail_data$Regimen_sub == "Multiple Dose", "with", paste("on the", DoseDay, "day of"))` `r exp_detail_data$SimDuration/24` days of dosing of `r MyEffector` (`r exp_detail_data$Dose_inhib` mg `r DoseFreq_inhib`) were generated. `r DefaultCompound_txt` Performance verification of the `r ifelse(victim_sim, MyEffector, MySubstrate)` model is provided in Appendix B â€“ Performance Verification of CYP3A Substrates, Inhibitors and Inducers.

```{r pullPK}

PKsum <- pksummary_table(sim_data_file = paste0(OutPath, "/", sim_data_file), 
                         PKparameters = PKparameters, 
                         observed_PK = observed_PK,
                         mean_type = mean_type_PK, 
                         tissue = tissue, 
                         includeCV = includeCV,
                         includeConfInt = includeConfInt,
                         includeTrialMeans = includeTrialMeans,
                         prettify_compound_names = prettify_compound_names)

suppressMessages(
    PKToPull <- data.frame(
        PrettifiedNames = sub(as.character(prettify_compound_names["effector"]),
                              "effector", names(PKsum$Table))) %>% 
        left_join(AllPKParameters, multiple = "all") %>% 
        filter(complete.cases(PKparameter)) %>% pull(PKparameter)
)

Dose1included <- any(str_detect(PKToPull, "_dose1"))
LastDoseincluded <- any(str_detect(PKToPull, "_last"))
Observedincluded <- any(complete.cases(observed_PK))

FigText2 <- ifelse(Dose1included & LastDoseincluded, 
                   ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub == "Oral", 
                          "the first and multiple oral doses", 
                          paste("the first and multiple", exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub, "doses")),
                   ifelse(Dose1included, 
                          ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub == "Oral", 
                                 "the first oral dose",
                                 paste("the first", exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub, "dose")),
                          ifelse(exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub == "Oral", 
                                 "multiple oral doses", 
                                 paste("multiple", exp_detail_data$DoseRoute_sub, "doses"))))

FigText3 <- ifelse(any(complete.cases(MyEffector)),
                   paste0("with or without ", MyEffector, " "),
                   "")

MeanTypePK <- ifelse(is.na(mean_type_PK), "geometric", mean_type_PK)

MyPKResults <- PKsum$Table
```

```{r makeTablePKSummaryOutput}

TableSubHead <- as.data.frame(t(names(MyPKResults)))
names(MyPKResults) <- paste0("V", 1:ncol(MyPKResults))

FT <- flextable::flextable(MyPKResults) %>%
    flextable::delete_part(part = "header") %>%
    flextable::add_header(V1 = "",
                          V2 = str_to_title(MySubstrate),
                          V3 = str_to_title(MySubstrate),
                          V4 = paste(str_to_title(MySubstrate), "plus", str_to_title(MyEffector)),
                          V5 = paste(str_to_title(MySubstrate), "plus", str_to_title(MyEffector)),
                          V6 = "GMR",
                          V7 = "GMR") %>%
    flextable::merge_h(part = "header") %>%
    flextable::add_body(values = TableSubHead) %>%

    # center text
    flextable::align(align = "center", part = "all") %>%

    # making the width work
    flextable::set_table_properties(layout = "fixed") %>%
    flextable::width(j = 1, width = 1.15) %>%

    # Set the font size
    flextable::fontsize(part = "body", size = fontsize) %>%

    # Make the text bold
    flextable::bold(part = "body", i = 1) %>%
    flextable::bold(part = "body", j = 1) %>%
    flextable::bold(part = "header") %>%

    # borders
    flextable::border_remove() %>%
    flextable::vline(border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5), part = "all") %>%
    flextable::hline_bottom(border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5)) %>%
    flextable::hline_top(border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5), part = "header") %>%
    flextable::hline_top(border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5), part = "body",
                         j = 2:7) %>%
    flextable::vline_left(part = "all", border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5)) %>%
    flextable::hline(border = officer::fp_border(width = 0.5),
                     part = "body", i = 1)

# Dealing with subscripts
NamePattern <- " AUCt | AUCinf | AUCtau | Cmax | Cmin | tmax | fa| fg| fh| ka| tlag"

ColNames <- data.frame(OrigName = as.character(TableSubHead)) %>% 
    mutate(Part1 = sapply(OrigName, 
                          FUN = function(x) {str_split(x, pattern = NamePattern)[[1]][1]}), 
           Part2 = sub("inf|tau|max|min|a|g|h|lag", "", str_trim(str_extract(OrigName, NamePattern))), 
           Part2 = sub("AUCt", "AUC", Part2),
           Subscript = sub(" AUC| C| t| f| k", "", str_extract(OrigName, NamePattern)), 
           Part3 = sapply(OrigName, 
                          FUN = function(x) {str_split(x, pattern = NamePattern)[[1]][2]})) 

for(i in 1:nrow(ColNames)){
    
    if(complete.cases(ColNames$Subscript[i])){
        FT <- FT %>% 
            flextable::compose(part = "body", i = 1,
                               j = which(TableSubHead == ColNames$OrigName[i]),
                               value = flextable::as_paragraph(ColNames$Part1[i], " ",
                                                               ColNames$Part2[i],
                                                               flextable::as_sub(ColNames$Subscript[i]), 
                                                               ColNames$Part3[i]))
    }
}

FT

names(MyPKResults) <- as.character(TableSubHead)

```
